bluecast.preprocessing.feature_selection¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

RFECVSelector

Select top features based on selection_strategy defined in FeatureSelectionConfig.
class bluecast.preprocessing.feature_selection.RFECVSelector(random_state: int = 0, min_features_to_select: int = 5, class_problem=None)¶

Bases: bluecast.preprocessing.custom.CustomPreprocessing

Select top features based on selection_strategy defined in FeatureSelectionConfig.

On default cross-validated recursive feature elimination is used.

fit_transform(df: pandas.DataFrame, target: pandas.Series) → Tuple[pandas.DataFrame, pandas.Series | None]¶
transform(df: pandas.DataFrame, target: pandas.Series | None = None, predicton_mode: bool = False) → Tuple[pandas.DataFrame, pandas.Series | None]¶

Use prediction mode to not process the missing target during inference.
